"A.D.2028/3/23/11:00": "Kyaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!! W-What's this? What is this... ADORABLE lifeform?!"
"Oh my goodness! HE'S. SO. CUUUTTTEEE! Blond hair! Blue eyes! And that sweater...! He's a miracle of this world!"
"...She's creepy...! Big sis! Do something!"
"Hehehe, don't be so cruel... We can have fun together! I won't do anything bad to you."
"Down, girl."
"Kohri, didn't you say you hated boys?"
"Oh, no, I can always stomach girly boys~!"
"I can't believe you just said something like that."
"By the way Hitsugi, where did you pick him up from?"
"...Don't laugh, okay?"
"From inside PSO2, huh... Hmm... Umm... Hmm..."
"I know it's hard to believe, but it's the truth. If you think about it, it's the only explanation that makes sense."
"I'm not doubting you! Have I ever doubted you before, Hitsugi?"
"But if it's true, then... ...Can I take this precious little cinnamon roll home with me?"
"I'm being serious here."
"Come on, I was just playing around."
"But regardless of whether or not you did bring Aru out from PSO2, we definitely have a problem on our hands, don't we?"
"Now that I think about it, normal logic aside, I think I have an idea of what might have caused this."
"You say that, but... Everything that happened yesterday was so unreal. How could you know how this happened?"
"...Aru. You don’t remember anything, right?"
"Hmm... Now, what should we do? If we had someone else to ask, we might find a clue to help us."
"Well, I guess I could ask <%me>..."
"I don’t think I could even explain <%me>’s existence…! In fact, I need someone else explain this all to me!"
"Ah... Achoo!"
"Come to think of it, I meant to ask earlier, but why is he wearing that?"
"Uhh... This was the only thing I had for him to wear..."
"Hmm, well... There's a lot we don't know, but let’s do what we can for now, okay?"
"Aru, why don't we go buy you some clothes?"
"Clothes, huh...? Sounds nice... I'd like to to try wearing something different too... ...Ah! F-Forget I said that!"
"Ahem! Now, regarding Aru... ...We don’t have enough data to determine whether he’s from our world or theirs."
"We might find out more if we meet him in person but we can’t exactly ask him to come here... Hrmm, this is frustrating."
